wikipedia_page.main: Evan "Ianto" Davies (c. 1892 - c. 1946) was a Welsh international rugby union full back who played club rugby for Llanelli and Maesteg. He won a single cap for Wales and also played county rugby for Glamorgan

response: * Ianto Davies (), Welsh international rugby union full back
